name: Don't Space Alone
description:
Asteroids meets Lovers in a Dangerous Spacetime. Survive in an asteroid field, supports up to three players at once.

-Arrows to control the spaceship, Asteroids style. 

-Rotate the shield with A and D buttons, press W to activate. Watch out for the shield meter!

-Press Spacebar to fire the laser. Shoot down those asteroids! Shooting through a shield amps the lasers up. 

Survive for as long as possible!
